content: Hi @WG-polonius -- I'm back from vacation and slowly coming back online. Sorry I missed the meeting yesterday, had to run out for a local emergency (everybody's fine).
I see there's been a lot of activity!
Happy to hear that! I’m on the night train back from vacation in Berlin so I haven’t done anything for the last week
I don’t even have a computer with me :)

welcome back you two ! don't worry you didn't miss a meeting, there hasn't been one since a bit before All Hands and we decided to wait until Fall / everyone was back and available for sync meetings (like wg-traits IIRC). I myself am still on vacation and will be back next week. Hope y'all had great holidays :)
btw I won't be able to attend the meeting tomorrow; traveling for RustConf
